short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents pinned a tab from being closed accidentally!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is open source and prevents pinned tab from being closed (when the closing tab isn't last). It can be useful for any chrome-based browser with vertical tabs feature.
